sections.general: donor advocate professional summary organized professional with a passion to help others. backed by four years of classroom teaching experience, one year leading an international children's choir and over two years in donor relations, i enjoy working with others in an effort to help them feel valued and successful. i am a creative thinker, eager to learn and discover new ways to implement strategies in order to successfully reach others.
